Lanark, South Lanarkshire, Scotland, UK Promoted by Douglas Colliery Band Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £4, 5th £2, 6th £1. March contest - 1st Milnwood, 2nd Bo'ness Carriden. 8 bands competed.
